channel.title: Coronado Springs Resort on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Coronado Springs Resort on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Toledo
item.description: In our last year’s trip, we ate at Topolino which was pretty good. I had similar expectations for this restaurant because the menu looked even more exciting. The whole game plan here was to go for the prix fixe menu. We typically enjoy these types of menus because it helped us think less and just enjoy the experience. The entire menu, ingredient wise, seemed very accessible and still fit along the lines of Spanish style flavors.
